meanings.definition: Echinoids: sea urchins and sand dollars
meanings.sent1: The echinoids in the tide pool were colorful and fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study echinoids to learn more about marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The echinoids had a party on the ocean floor, celebrating their spiky shells.
meanings.sent4: The echinoids stood out like jewels in the underwater world.
meanings.sent5: Children love collecting echinoids at the beach, admiring their unique shapes.

meanings.definition: Echinoids: marine animals with spiny shells
meanings.sent1: The diver carefully avoided the echinoids while exploring the reef.
meanings.sent2: Echinoids use their spiny shells for protection against predators.
meanings.sent3: The echinoids organized a spiky fashion show under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The echinoids resembled tiny armored tanks moving gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: Tourists were amazed by the beauty of the echinoids in the aquarium.

meanings.definition: Echinoids: belonging to the class Echinoidea
meanings.sent1: The echinoids species discovered recently was classified as rare.
meanings.sent2: Echinoids creatures exhibit unique behaviors in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The echinoids party was the most exclusive event in the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The echinoids community thrived in the depths of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The echinoids environment was carefully studied by marine biologists.
